questions:
Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a barn
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) An empty barn
C) A busy street scene
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) The sky
B) The interior of a barn
C) A group of people
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A wooden barn and pile of woods  
C) A barn door
D) A person

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A grassy field
C) A city skyline
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A car
B) A pile of wood planks
C) A bicycle
D) A picnic table

What type of structure is depicted in the photo?
A) A modern house
B) A skyscraper
C) A wooden barn
D) A stone castle

What material is predominantly used in the structure?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Brick
D) Glass

What can be seen through the open door in the background?
A) A beach
B) A forest
C) A grassy field
D) A city street

Are there any animals visible in the photo?
A) Yes, several
B) No, none
C) Only one
D) Only birds

What does the pile of wood in the foreground suggest?
A) Construction or repairs
B) Decoration
C) Furniture
D) Firewood

What is the state of the ground inside the barn?
A) Covered with grass
B) Dirt floor
C) Paved with stones
D) Carpeted

What is the primary color of the barn's interior?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Brown/wooden
D) White

What is visible through the gaps in the barn walls?
A) The sky
B) Another building
C) Trees and greenery
D) Water

What is the lighting like inside the barn?
A) Bright and sunny
B) Dim and shadowy
C) Artificially lit
D) Completely dark

Are there any tools visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many
B) No, none
C) Only a few
D) Only large machinery

What does the open door in the background lead to?
A) Another room
B) The outside
C) A hallway
D) A basement

What type of vegetation is visible outside the barn?
A) Desert plants
B) Tropical plants
C) Grass and trees
D) Flower garden

How is the wood in the barn arranged?
A) Neatly stacked
B) Scattered randomly
C) Piled up high
D) Hung on the walls

A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and rustic
C) Painted and glossy
D) Covered in wallpaper

What is the structural design of the barn?
A) Open and spacious
B) Closed and cramped
C) Multi-story
D) Circular

What type of door does the barn have?
A) Sliding door
B) Hinged door
C) Revolving door
D) No door

A) Yes, many
B) No, none
C) Only one
D) Only skylights

What can be seen on the ground outside the barn through the open door?
A) Pavement
B) Grass
C) Sand
D) Water

What is the primary color of the wood used in the barn?
A) Dark brown
B) Light brown
C) Painted white
D) Stained black

What type of beams are visible in the barn's structure?
A) Metal beams
B) Wooden beams
C) Concrete beams
D) Plastic beams

What is the primary lighting source in the barn?
A) Natural light
B) Electric lights
C) Candlelight
D) Flashlights

What is the overall architectural style of the barn?
A) Modern
B) Rustic
C) Industrial
D) Futuristic

What is the state of the wood planks in the foreground?
A) New and unused
B) Old and weathered
C) Painted and polished
D) Covered in moss

B) Metal sheets
C) Wooden shingles

A) Dirt

C) Wooden planks
